definition: Gaea, the Earth Goddess and mother of the Titans
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned

sentences.english: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.
sentences.chinese: 甚至你們作了馬其頓和亞該亞，所有信主之人的榜樣。

sentences.english: no one will stop me from this boasting in the regions of Achaia.
sentences.chinese: 就無人能在亞該亞一帶地方阻擋我這自誇。

sentences.english: We have references in his his letters to churches in Achaea, like Corinth.
sentences.chinese: 我們有他致亞該亞教會的信，像科林斯城。
